thread.section_title: Fixrunner Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fixrunner | fixrunner.com
thread.title: Ileen Elizabeth

author: Ileen Elizabeth
title: Ileen Elizabeth
text:
My organization owes our professional look, streamlined reporting system and the ease it has caused to Sam and the Fixrunner team. We're a professional membership and scholarship generating organization with 1 paid employee, a strong board of directors and active working committees. Sam's recommendations cut the Administrators clerical time in half which frees her up to work closely with scholarship applicants, recipients, membership recruitment, sponsors and donors. Sam listened, reviewed and gave the best recommendations and built the site to be both a tool and working partner. Thank you Sam and Fixrunner. BWLA-Chicago,
Dr. Kelly
